pages.privacy-policy: WristWonder - Privacy Policy: Your Information and Artisanal Bracelets WristWonder HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Privacy Policy At WristWonder, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard the information you provide to us when you use our website or purchase artisanal bracelets from us. Information We Collect We may collect various types of information when you visit our website or make a purchase, including: Personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and shipping address. Information about your browsing activity on our website, such as pages visited and products viewed. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to: Process and fulfill your orders. pages.terms-conditions: WristWonder - Terms and Conditions: Rules for Artisanal Bracelets Purchase WristWonder HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Terms and Conditions By accessing this website (WristWonders.com) and/or purchasing our products, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions ("Terms"). **Age Requirement:** You must be at least 18 years old and legally capable of entering into binding contracts to use this website and purchase our products. **Pricing:** All prices listed on our website are in Indian Rupees (INR) and include applicable taxes. We reserve the right to change prices without notice. **Order Acceptance:** We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order at any time for any reason. We will notify you if your order is cancelled. **Payment:** We accept various payment methods as listed on our website. You are responsible for ensuring sufficient funds are available for your purchase. **Shipping:** We will ship your order according to the shipping method you select at checkout. Shipping costs and estimated delivery times are available on our website. **Returns and Exchanges:** You may be eligible to return or exchange your product within a certain timeframe, subject to our return policy. Please refer to our return policy for details. **Intellectual Property:** The content of this website, including text, graphics, logos, and trademarks, is the property of WristWonders or its licensors and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. **Limitation of Liability:** We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of this website or our products. **Governing Law:** These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. **Entire Agreement:** These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and WristWonders regarding your use of this website and the purchase of our products. **Changes to Terms:** We may revise these Terms at any time by updating this webpage. You are bound by any revisions and should periodically visit this page to review the current Terms. The WristWonder website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline WristWonder > Disclaimers > Privacy & Policy > Terms & Conditions
